alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 9:37AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph in town and 40 mph at higher elevations. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a slight chance that the snow may briefly mix with rain in the afternoon, but the atmosphere is expected to be cold enough to mainly support snow. Overall snow totals are expected to be in the 1 to 3 inch range including the hillside and Eagle River.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
